function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of the mouse click event for selecting ROI may introduce the risk of contamination through shared surfaces.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to shared surfaces, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Use touchless or voice-activated input methods for selecting ROI, or regularly sanitize the mouse and surrounding area.","Technologies":"Touchless input devices, voice recognition technology, or self-sanitizing surfaces for the mouse and surrounding area.","People":"Individuals using the mouse for ROI selection, as well as those in contact with the mouse and surrounding area.","Owner":"Technology companies, researchers, and users of the ROI selection method."},{"Description":"Utilization of pedestrian detection models may lead to increased interaction with potentially infected individuals during data collection.","Impact":"Higher risk of exposure to contagious diseases when deploying and training pedestrian detection models in public spaces.","Mitigation":"Minimize in-person data collection by using pre-labeled datasets or remote sensing techniques for model training.","Technologies":"Pre-labeled datasets, remote sensing technologies, and virtual simulations for model training and evaluation.","People":"Researchers, data collectors, and individuals present in the vicinity of data collection for model training.","Owner":"Research institutions, data collection organizations, and developers of pedestrian detection models."},{"Description":"Use of shared GPU resources in the Google Colab environment may pose a risk of exposure to contagious diseases through shared computational resources.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission when accessing and utilizing GPU resources in shared computing environments.","Mitigation":"Utilize dedicated or private GPU resources for computation, or ensure stringent cleaning and sanitization protocols for shared GPU resources.","Technologies":"Dedicated private GPU servers, virtual private cloud services, and enhanced cleaning and sanitization technologies for shared computing resources.","People":"Users accessing and sharing GPU resources in the Google Colab environment.","Owner":"Google Colab administrators, cloud service providers, and users of shared GPU resources."}]}
